tool_description: Creates the foundational structure for employee engagement surveys including metadata, sections, and basic configuration settings.

survey_title.description: Title of the employee engagement survey

survey_description.description: Brief description of survey purpose and scope

target_audience.description: Target employee group (all_employees, management, department_specific, remote_workers, new_hires)

error_messages: Invalid target audience: Must be one of [all_employees, management, department_specific, remote_workers, new_hires]
Duration out of range: Estimated duration must be between 5 and 60 minutes
Empty sections array: At least one survey section must be specified
Too many sections: Maximum 10 sections allowed for optimal user experience
usage: Provide survey_title, target_audience, and survey_sections array. Optionally specify survey_description and estimated_duration. Creates the basic survey framework ready for question addition.

survey_id.description: Unique identifier for the created survey

template_structure.description: JSON string representing the survey template structure
